name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Joseph Steven SOUDER, Appellant

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, jj.
McDERMOTT, J., did not participate in the decision of this case.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Joseph Steven SOUDER, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
McDERMOTT, J., did not participate in the decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Gerald P. Deady, Wilkes-Barre, for appellant.
Jerome L. Cohen, Dist. Atty., Marisue Elias-Welsh, Mari M. Van Wie, Asst. Dist. Attys., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
615 A.2d 733
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Joseph Steven SOUDER, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Dec. 4, 1991.
Decided Nov. 12, 1992.
Gerald P. Deady, Wilkes-Barre, for appellant.
Jerome L. Cohen, Dist. Atty., Marisue Elias-Welsh, Mari M. Van Wie, Asst. Dist. Attys., for appellee.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, jj.
